title: Ep 67: Do it Anyways
description: In this episode I explore the idea of creativity - when is the best time to be creative and can you do it with kids? How about sickness? During a life crisis? They myth of genius and how to do things in addition to dealing with life's shit sandwiches.
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
